body.p:
To His Excellency
Govener of Kentuckey
St Joseph Missouri
Jany 12"/61
Kind Sir
I believe it is within your power to appoint a certain number of persons in Every state to take the acknowledgments of Deeds of lands lying and being within your state
There is no such person in our city or near it that has that power and we frequently see great inconvenience arising from it

Will you be good Enough to forward me a commission Empowering me to take acknowledgments of Deeds in this State for the state of Kentuckey & at the same time Enclose Your fee bill & I will remit the amount

Yours Very Respectfuly
Augustus S. Hamlin

Comr. of Deeds
A. S. Hamlin
St. Joseph
Issd Jany 19. 1861
